text: Trogloconcha is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Larocheidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Trogloconcha include: * Trogloconcha christinae Geiger, 2003 * Trogloconcha lozoueti Geiger, 2008 * Trogloconcha ohashii Kase & Kano, 2002 * Trogloconcha tesselata Kase & Kano, 2002 ==References== * Geiger D.L. (2003) Phylogenetic assessment of characters proposed for the generic classification of Recent Scissurellidae (Gastropoda: Vetigastropoda) with a description of one new genus and six new species from Easter Island and Australia. Molluscan Research 23: 21-83. * Geiger D.L. & Jansen P. (2004). New species of Australian Scissurellidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Vetigastropoda) with remarks on Australian and Indo-Malayan species. Zootaxa 714:1-72. ==External links== * Category:Larocheidae
title: Trogloconcha
